products.title: Verona Prime 25mm Dark Grey Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A trending shade, this dark grey perfect fit venetian blind adds an bold, modern look to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.

products.title: Ash Perfect Fit
products.description: Amid-greyshade, theash grey25mm perfect fit blind will give any room the modern feel, this colour oozes with class. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.

products.title: Carbon Perfect Fit
products.description: Perfect fit carbon wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Infusion Asc Stone Grey Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc stone grey perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Infusion Asc Taupe Perfect Fit

products.title: Metallic Silver Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: This blind is the ultimate in modernity. We're not saying space age exactly but we're sure the martians would be impressed. The brushed metallic finish looks stylish and the integral frame is as easy as they come. With no need for drills or power tools, these frames simply click t this blind is the ultimate in modernity.

products.title: Silver Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Sometimes the most elegant look is created simply. This silver venetian blind is incredibly simple but really looks the part. A simple, metallic silver finish that feels incredibly contemporary. It's a hardwearing blind too, which makes it versatile. Pop it in the kitchen or bathr sometimes the most elegant look is created simply.

products.title: Mid Grey Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: There's nothing middle of the road about these mid grey perfect fit venetian blinds, they're certainly at the top of their game. The smooth, sleek grey slats are incredibly stylish, and incredibly robust. If that wasn't enough to make these blinds perfect for a modern home, then th there's nothing middle of the road about these mid grey perfect fit venetian blinds, they're certainly at the top of their game.

products.title: Metallic Silver Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: With a brushed metal finish, this metallic silver perfect fit venetian blind is stylish and contemporary. The lunar grey colourway with sweeping strokes add real depth to this modern looking blind.

products.title: Silver Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Pure and simple, this metallic silver venetian blind will work a treat in conservatories with silver finishes. Helping to create a chic and polished look this blind is a timeless and classic choice.

products.title: Mid Grey Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: With a matt finish and mid grey tone this venetian blind is darkly elegant and a superb accompaniment to other sophisticated and stylish finishes. This smart blind will work equally well with other deep shades or maybe lighter greys.

products.title: Sakura Grey Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of oursakura patterned range, with a simple floral design which will bring warmth to any room. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through.

products.title: Galaxy Asc Blackout Silver Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their galaxy blackout range, where advanced solar control (asc) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.

products.title: Hive Silkweave Ash Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their hivesilkweave range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb dim-out fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hive silkweave" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Made to measure hive silkweave ash grey perfect fit pleated blind, px78004.
